```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- data.frame(x = seq(1, 20, by = .1))

df %>% 
  mutate(y = sin(x),
         y_2 = cos(x)) %>% 
  ggplot()+
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = x, y = y))+
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = x, y = y_2))+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0)
```
